content: I think I'm starting to understand the concept of vulnerability better, but I'm still struggling with how to apply it in my relationships. I've had an intense conversation with my partner about our beliefs on relationships and commitment, and I realized that my beliefs have been shaped by societal expectations and cultural norms, rather than my own values and desires. I want to be more vulnerable in my relationship, but I'm not sure how to start. Can you give me some specific examples of how I can practice vulnerability with my partner?
